id.description: The unique identifier of the contact.

workspace_id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace associated with the contact.

role.description: Role or position of the contact.

email.description: The email address of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

avatar.description: URL pointing to the contact's avatar image.

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the contact's owner.

social_profiles.description: Social profiles associated with the contact.

data.description: Array of social profile data associated with the contact.

has_hard_bounced.description: Flag indicating if the contact has hard bounced.

marked_email_as_spam.description: Flag indicating if the contact's email was marked as spam.

unsubscribed_from_emails.description: Flag indicating if the contact unsubscribed from emails.

unsubscribed_from_sms.description: Flag indicating if the contact unsubscribed from SMS.

created_at.description: The date and time when the contact was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last updated.

signed_up_at.description: The date and time when the contact signed up.

last_seen_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last seen overall.

last_replied_at.description: The date and time when the contact last replied.

last_contacted_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last contacted.

last_email_opened_at.description: The date and time when the contact last opened an email.

last_email_clicked_at.description: The date and time when the contact last clicked an email.

language_override.description: Language override set for the contact.

browser.description: The browser used by the contact.

browser_version.description: The version of the browser used by the contact.

browser_language.description: The language preference set in the contact's browser.

os.description: Operating system of the contact's device.

continent_code.description: Continent code of the contact's location.

country_code.description: Country code of the contact's location.

android_app_name.description: The name of the Android app associated with the contact.

android_app_version.description: The version of the Android app associated with the contact.

android_device.description: The device used by the contact for Android.

android_os_version.description: The operating system version of the Android device.

android_sdk_version.description: The SDK version of the Android device.

android_last_seen_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last seen on Android.

ios_app_name.description: The name of the iOS app associated with the contact.

ios_app_version.description: The version of the iOS app associated with the contact.

ios_device.description: The device used by the contact for iOS.

ios_os_version.description: The operating system version of the iOS device.

ios_sdk_version.description: The SDK version of the iOS device.

ios_last_seen_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last seen on iOS.

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes defined for the contact.

type.description: Type of connection with the tags.

data.description: Array of tag data associated with the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier of the tag.

url.description: URL to access more tag information.

total_count.description: Total count of tags associated with the contact.

has_more.description: Flag indicating if there are more tags to load.

type.description: Type of connection with the notes.

data.description: Array of note data associated with the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier of the note.

url.description: URL to access more note information.

total_count.description: Total count of notes associated with the contact.

has_more.description: Flag indicating if there are more notes to load.

type.description: Type of connection with the companies.

data.description: Array of company data associated with the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier of the company.

url.description: URL to access more company information.

total_count.description: Total count of companies associated with the contact.

has_more.description: Flag indicating if there are more companies to load.

opted_out_subscription_types.description: Subscription types the contact opted out from.

type.description: Type of connection with the subscription types.

data.description: Array of subscription type data opted out from by the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription type.

url.description: URL to access more subscription type information.

total_count.description: Total count of subscription types the contact opted out from.

has_more.description: Flag indicating if there are more subscription types to load.

opted_in_subscription_types.description: Subscription types the contact opted into.

type.description: Type of connection with the subscription types.

data.description: Array of subscription type data opted into by the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription type.

url.description: URL to access more subscription type information.

total_count.description: Total count of subscription types the contact opted into.

has_more.description: Flag indicating if there are more subscription types to load.

referrer.description: Referrer information related to the contact.
